name: Windows 95 3D Maze but it's a Game
name_original: Windows 95 3D Maze but it's a Game
description:
This is a recreation of Windows 95's 3D maze screensaver. NO, IT'S NOT IMPOSSIBLE AS SEEN IN THE SCREENSHOTS.

Software I used to make this project:

  • https://www.mazegenerator.net/ Maze SVG file
  • https://www.blender.org/ Converting maze to 3D and doing the whole development.  I used version 2.79b for 64 bit.

NOTE: This game is made for 64 bits. + Microsoft made the textures and the original game. (C) 2019-2022 GBR213. (C) 1995-2001 Microsoft for the 3D Maze screensaver.
